item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: 'War will be met with war' Khamenei warns US
item.description: Iran and Israel continued to exchange attacks into Wednesday amid the latest round of conflict between the two nations.

item.title: Supreme Court upholds a state law banning some gender-affirming care for trans kids
item.description: The Supreme Court on Wednesday upheld a Tennessee law banning certain gender-affirming care treatment for minors.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to delay TikTok ban for 3rd time
item.description: Trump is expected to extend the deadline, which was set to expire on Thursday, requiring China’s ByteDance to divest TikTok’s U.S. business or face a ...

item.title: US unemployment ticked down, hovering at historically low levels
item.description: The number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits dipped to 245,000 last week amid uncertainty over President Donald Trump’s trade policies
